prayer.title: 🕊️ Morning Prayer
prayer.parsha_theme: dreams, building from nothing, divine protection
prayer.modeh_ani: מודה אני לפניך — I gratefully thank You, living and eternal King, for returning my soul within me with compassion.
prayer.blessing: Blessed are You who girds Israel with strength — fortify me for the work ahead.
prayer.psalm: Psalm 90:17: "May the favor of the Lord our God rest on us; establish the work of our hands."
prayer.proverb: Proverbs 21:5: "The plans of the diligent lead surely to abundance."
prayer.intention: Guide my hands today as I build — let every line of code, every decision, every conversation serve Your purposes.
prayer.closing: May your work today be a pleasing offering. May your rest tonight be deep and restorative.

family.title: 👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 Family Focus
family.suggestion: Jones is at that age where he'll remember building things with dad. Set up a simple block tower challenge or play 'rescue mission' with his Super Wings toys.
family.conversationStarter: Ask Jillian: What book are you reading right now? (Or: Any concerts you've been wanting to see?)
family.weeklyGoal: Plan your February date night this week — Valentine's Day is in 10 days!
family.potencyAction: Give her space if she needs it, then come back with a genuine apology

relationshipTemperature.note: Ratio is below 5:1. Focus on repair and acts of service this week.

family.reflection: The relationship temperature is flagging critical. Today isn't about grand gestures — it's about genuine presence and acknowledging recent friction without defending yourself.
